Functions
neuro_SystemOut
This function writes a log line to standard out (often an alert box if the console is off)
neuro_SystemErr
This function writes a log line to standard err (often an alert box)

Functions

neuro_encode64

function neuro_encode64(input)

Base64 encodes the passed input This [function] was written by Tyler Akins and has been placed in the public domain.  It would be nice if you left this header intact.  Base64 code from Tyler Akins -- http://rumkin.com

Parameters

inputthe input to encode

neuro_decode64

function neuro_decode64(input)

Base64 decodes the passed input This [function] was written by Tyler Akins and has been placed in the public domain.  It would be nice if you left this header intact.  Base64 code from Tyler Akins -- http://rumkin.com

Parameters

inputthe input to decode

function neuro_expandError(e)

Takes an error object and gives a bit more description.  Some browers show more info then others...

Parameters

ethe error object to expand

Returns

the expanded object in a printable string
